name: User Authentication - Login Success
description: As a user I want to authenticate with valid credentials So that I can access my wallet and manage my accounts
gherkin_text:
Feature: User Authentication
As a user
I want to authenticate with the system
So that I can access my wallet and manage my accounts

Scenario: Successful Login
Given I am on the login page
And I have valid credentials
When I enter my email "#loginId" as "user@example.com"
And I enter my password "#loginPwd" as "password123"
And I click the login button
Then the system should authenticate me via "authLogin" action
And my user data should be saved to "#user"
And my wallet data should be saved to "#wallets"
And my session should be saved to "#session"
And I should be redirected to the home page

name: User Authentication - Login Failure
description: As a user I want to receive clear error messages when login fails So that I understand what went wrong
gherkin_text:
Feature: User Authentication
As a user
I want to authenticate with the system
So that I can access my wallet and manage my accounts

Scenario: Failed Login
Given I am on the login page
And I have invalid credentials
When I enter my email "#loginId" as "invalid@example.com"
And I enter my password "#loginPwd" as "wrongpassword"
And I click the login button
Then the system should show an error message
And I should remain on the login page

name: User Registration - Signup Success
description: As a new user I want to create an account So that I can access the wallet system
gherkin_text:
Feature: User Registration
As a new user
I want to create an account
So that I can access the wallet system

Scenario: Successful Registration
Given I am on the signup page
When I enter my email "#signupId" as "newuser@example.com"
And I enter my password "#signupPassword" as "newpassword123"
And I confirm my password "#signupPasswordConfirm" as "newpassword123"
And I enter my phone "#signupPhone" as "+1234567890"
And I click the signup button
Then the system should create my account via "authSignup" action
And I should be redirected to the success page
And my account email should be displayed

name: PIN Code Management - Create PIN Success
description: As a user I want to create a secure PIN code So that I can protect my wallet access
gherkin_text:
Feature: PIN Code Management
As a user
I want to create and manage my PIN code
So that I can secure my wallet access

Scenario: Create PIN Code Successfully
Given I am on the PIN code creation page
When I enter a 6-digit PIN code "123456"
And I confirm the same PIN code "123456"
Then the PIN code should be validated via "typePincode" action
And the system should save the PIN to "#pincode"
And I should be redirected to the home page

name: PIN Code Management - PIN Creation Failure
description: As a user I want to be notified when PIN codes don't match So that I can correct my input
gherkin_text:
Feature: PIN Code Management
As a user
I want to create and manage my PIN code
So that I can secure my wallet access

Scenario: PIN Code Creation Failure
Given I am on the PIN code creation page
When I enter a 6-digit PIN code "123456"
And I enter a different confirmation PIN "654321"
Then the system should show "Incorrect PIN code" message
And the PIN code fields should be cleared
And I should be prompted to try again

name: PIN Code Visual Feedback
description: As a user I want visual feedback while entering my PIN So that I can see my progress
gherkin_text:
Feature: PIN Code Management
As a user
I want to create and manage my PIN code
So that I can secure my wallet access

Scenario: PIN Code Visual Feedback
Given I am on the PIN code creation page
When I start entering digits
Then the PIN symbols should change color to "#319CF3" as I type
And the title should show "Create a PIN code" for first 6 digits
And the title should show "Confirm a PIN code" for next 6 digits

name: Wallet Management - View Balance
description: As a user I want to view my wallet balance So that I can see my current crypto assets
gherkin_text:
Feature: Wallet Management
As a user
I want to manage my wallets and accounts
So that I can organize my crypto assets

Scenario: View Wallet Balance
Given I am logged in
And I have a wallet with ID "#walletId"
When I navigate to the assets page
Then the system should call "getWalletBalance" action
And my wallet balance should be displayed
And the total USD value should be shown

name: Account Management - Create Account
description: As a user I want to create new accounts So that I can organize my crypto assets
gherkin_text:
Feature: Account Management
As a user
I want to manage my accounts
So that I can organize my crypto assets

Scenario: Create New Account
Given I am on the account list page
When I click "Add Account"
And I enter an account name "#createAccountName" as "My Trading Account"
And I click "Create"
Then the system should call "createAccount" action
And a new account should be created
And I should be redirected to the account list
And the new account should appear in the list

name: Account Management - Delete Account
description: As a user I want to delete accounts So that I can remove unwanted accounts
gherkin_text:
Feature: Account Management
As a user
I want to manage my accounts
So that I can organize my crypto assets

Scenario: Delete Account
Given I am on the account list page
And I have an existing account
When I click the delete button for an account
Then a confirmation dialog should open
And when I confirm the deletion
Then the system should call "deleteAccount" action
And the account should be removed
And the dialog should close
And I should be redirected to the account list

name: Transaction Management - View Recent Transactions
description: As a user I want to view my transaction history So that I can track my crypto activities
gherkin_text:
Feature: Transaction Management
As a user
I want to view my transaction history
So that I can track my crypto activities

Scenario: View Recent Transactions
Given I am logged in
When I navigate to the home page
Then the system should call "getUserTransactions" action
And my recent transactions should be loaded into "#recentTransactions"
And the transactions should be displayed on the home page

name: Seed Phrase Management - View Seed Phrase
description: As a user I want to view my seed phrase So that I can backup my wallet
gherkin_text:
Feature: Seed Phrase Management
As a user
I want to view and restore my seed phrase
So that I can backup and recover my wallet

Scenario: View Seed Phrase
Given I am logged in
And I have a seed phrase stored in "#seed"
When I navigate to the seed show page
Then the system should call "onLoadSeedShow" action
And all 12 seed phrase words should be displayed
And each word should be shown in its respective text field

name: Profile Management - View Profile
description: As a user I want to view my profile information So that I can see my account details
gherkin_text:
Feature: Profile Management
As a user
I want to manage my profile information
So that I can keep my account details up to date

Scenario: View Profile Information
Given I am logged in
When I navigate to the profile page
Then the system should call "onLoadSettings" action
And my email should be displayed in the profile
And my nickname should be shown as "#_uiState.profile.nickname"
And my wallet address should be displayed as "#_uiState.profile.walletAddress"

name: Navigation - Settings Page
description: As a user I want to navigate to settings So that I can access configuration options
gherkin_text:
Feature: Navigation
As a user
I want to navigate between different sections
So that I can access all features of the app

Scenario: Navigate to Settings
Given I am on any page
When I click the settings button
Then the system should call "moveSettings" action
And I should be redirected to "/settings"

name: Navigation - Assets Page
description: As a user I want to navigate to assets So that I can view my crypto holdings
gherkin_text:
Feature: Navigation
As a user
I want to navigate between different sections
So that I can access all features of the app

Scenario: Navigate to Assets
Given I am on any page
When I click the assets button
Then the system should call "moveAssets" action
And I should be redirected to "/assets_wrap"

name: Error Handling - API Errors
description: As a user I want to receive clear error messages So that I understand what went wrong
gherkin_text:
Feature: Error Handling
As a user
I want to receive clear error messages
So that I understand what went wrong and how to fix it

Scenario: API Error Handling
Given I am performing an action that requires API access
When the API returns an error
Then the system should display an appropriate error message
And the error should be shown via "showPopup" action
And the user should be able to retry the action

name: Profile Update - Success
description: As a user I want to update my profile information So that my account details are current
gherkin_text:
Feature: Profile Management
As a user
I want to update my profile information
So that my account details are current

Scenario: Successful Profile Update
Given I am logged in
And I am on the profile edit page
When I enter my name "#nameInput" as "John Doe"
And I enter my email "#emailInput" as "john.doe@example.com"
And I enter my phone "#phoneInput" as "+1234567890"
And I click the update profile button
Then the system should validate my input via "validateInput" action
And the profile should be updated via "updateProfile" API call
And I should see "Profile updated successfully" message
And my updated profile data should be saved to "#user"

name: Profile Update - Validation Error
description: As a user I want to receive validation errors So that I can correct invalid profile data
gherkin_text:
Feature: Profile Management
As a user
I want to update my profile information
So that my account details are current

Scenario: Profile Update Validation Error
Given I am logged in
And I am on the profile edit page
When I enter an empty name "#nameInput" as ""
And I enter an invalid email "#emailInput" as "invalid-email"
And I click the update profile button
Then the system should validate my input via "validateInput" action
And I should see "Please fill in all required fields correctly" message
And my profile should not be updated

name: Send Notification - Success
description: As an admin I want to send notifications to users So that I can communicate important information
gherkin_text:
Feature: Notification Management
As an admin
I want to send notifications to users
So that I can communicate important information

Scenario: Successful Notification Sending
Given I am logged in as admin
And I am on the notification page
When I enter notification title "#titleInput" as "System Maintenance"
And I enter notification message "#messageInput" as "Scheduled maintenance tonight"
And I select notification type "#typeSelect" as "info"
And I enter recipient "#recipientInput" as "all-users"
And I click send notification button
Then the notification data should be prepared via "prepareNotification" action
And the notification should be sent via "sendNotification" API call
And I should see "Notification sent successfully" message

name: Send Notification - Failure
description: As an admin I want to receive error messages when notification sending fails So that I can retry the operation
gherkin_text:
Feature: Notification Management
As an admin
I want to send notifications to users
So that I can communicate important information

Scenario: Notification Sending Failure
Given I am logged in as admin
And I am on the notification page
And the notification service is unavailable
When I prepare valid notification data
And I click send notification button
Then the system should attempt to send via "sendNotification" API call
And I should see "Failed to send notification" message

name: File Upload - Success
description: As a user I want to upload files So that I can store documents in the system
gherkin_text:
Feature: File Management
As a user
I want to upload files
So that I can store documents in the system

Scenario: Successful File Upload
Given I am logged in
And I am on the file upload page
When I select a valid file "#selectedFile" smaller than 10MB
And I select folder "#folderSelect" as "documents"
And I enter description "#descriptionInput" as "Important document"
And I click upload button
Then the file should be validated via "validateFile" action
And the file should be uploaded via "uploadFile" API call
And the file should be added to "#fileList"
And I should see "File uploaded successfully" message

name: File Upload - Size Validation Error
description: As a user I want to receive validation errors for oversized files So that I understand upload limitations
gherkin_text:
Feature: File Management
As a user
I want to upload files
So that I can store documents in the system

Scenario: File Size Validation Error
Given I am logged in
And I am on the file upload page
When I select a file "#selectedFile" larger than 10MB
And I click upload button
Then the file should be validated via "validateFile" action
And I should see "Please select a file smaller than 10MB" message
And the file should not be uploaded

name: Data Export - Success
description: As a user I want to export my data So that I can backup or analyze it externally
gherkin_text:
Feature: Data Export
As a user
I want to export my data
So that I can backup or analyze it externally

Scenario: Successful Data Export
Given I am logged in
And I am on the export page
When I select export format "#formatSelect" as "CSV"
And I set start date "#startDate" as "2024-01-01"
And I set end date "#endDate" as "2024-12-31"
And I configure filters "#filters"
And I click export button
Then the export parameters should be prepared via "prepareExportData" action
And the export should be generated via "generateExport" API call
And the file should be downloaded automatically

name: User Search - Success
description: As an admin I want to search for users So that I can find specific user accounts
gherkin_text:
Feature: User Search
As an admin
I want to search for users
So that I can find specific user accounts

Scenario: Successful User Search
Given I am logged in as admin
And I am on the user management page
When I enter search query "#searchInput" as "john"
And I select role filter "#roleFilter" as "user"
And I select status filter "#statusFilter" as "active"
And I click search button
Then the search parameters should be prepared via "prepareSearchParams" action
And the search should be performed via "performSearch" API call
And the results should be displayed in "#results"
And pagination should be updated with "#totalPages" and "#totalCount"

name: Password Reset - Success
description: As a user I want to reset my password So that I can regain access to my account
gherkin_text:
Feature: Password Reset
As a user
I want to reset my password
So that I can regain access to my account

Scenario: Successful Password Reset Request
Given I am on the password reset page
When I enter my email "#emailInput" as "user@example.com"
And I click send reset email button
Then the email should be validated via "validateEmail" action
And the reset email should be sent via "sendResetEmail" API call
And I should see "Password reset email sent" message

name: Password Reset - Invalid Email
description: As a user I want to receive validation errors for invalid emails So that I can enter a correct email address
gherkin_text:
Feature: Password Reset
As a user
I want to reset my password
So that I can regain access to my account

Scenario: Password Reset Invalid Email
Given I am on the password reset page
When I enter an invalid email "#emailInput" as "invalid-email"
And I click send reset email button
Then the email should be validated via "validateEmail" action
And I should see "Please enter a valid email address" message
And no reset email should be sent

name: Bulk Delete - Success
description: As an admin I want to delete multiple items at once So that I can efficiently manage data
gherkin_text:
Feature: Bulk Operations
As an admin
I want to delete multiple items at once
So that I can efficiently manage data

Scenario: Successful Bulk Delete
Given I am logged in as admin
And I am on the items list page
And I have selected multiple items "#selectedItems"
When I click bulk delete button
Then a confirmation dialog should appear
When I confirm the deletion
Then the items should be deleted via "performBulkDelete" API call
And the list should be refreshed
And I should see "Items deleted successfully" message

name: Data List Refresh - Success
description: As a user I want to refresh data lists So that I can see the most current information
gherkin_text:
Feature: Data Management
As a user
I want to refresh data lists
So that I can see the most current information

Scenario: Successful Data List Refresh
Given I am logged in
And I am viewing a data list
When I click the refresh button
Then the system should fetch updated data via "fetchData" API call
And the list should be updated with "#items"
And pagination should be updated with "#totalPages" and "#totalCount"

name: System Health Check - All Services Healthy
description: As a system admin I want to check system health So that I can monitor service availability
gherkin_text:
Feature: System Monitoring
As a system admin
I want to check system health
So that I can monitor service availability

Scenario: All Services Healthy
Given I am logged in as system admin
When I run a health check
Then the database status should be checked via "checkDatabase" API call
And the API status should be checked via "checkAPI" API call
And the storage status should be checked via "checkStorage" API call
And the overall status should be "healthy"
And the health report should be generated with timestamp

name: Order Validation - Success
description: As a customer I want my order to be validated So that I can proceed with checkout
gherkin_text:
Feature: Order Processing
As a customer
I want my order to be validated
So that I can proceed with checkout

Scenario: Successful Order Validation
Given I am logged in as customer
And I have items in my cart "#cartItems"
And I have provided shipping address "#shippingAddress"
And I have selected payment method "#paymentMethod"
When I proceed to checkout
Then the order should be validated via "validateOrder" action
And I should see "Order validation successful" message

name: Order Creation - Success
description: As a customer I want to create an order So that I can purchase items
gherkin_text:
Feature: Order Processing
As a customer
I want to create an order
So that I can purchase items

Scenario: Successful Order Creation
Given I have a validated order
When the order is processed
Then the order data should be prepared via "prepareOrderData" action
And the order should be created via "createOrder" API call
And the order ID should be saved to "#currentOrderId"

name: Payment Processing - Success
description: As a customer I want my payment to be processed So that I can complete my purchase
gherkin_text:
Feature: Payment Processing
As a customer
I want my payment to be processed
So that I can complete my purchase

Scenario: Successful Payment Processing
Given I have a created order with ID "#currentOrderId"
And I have selected payment method "#paymentMethod"
When the payment is processed
Then the payment should be processed via "processPayment" API call
And I should see "Payment processed successfully" message

name: Inventory Update - Success
description: As a system I want to update inventory after orders So that stock levels remain accurate
gherkin_text:
Feature: Inventory Management
As a system
I want to update inventory after orders
So that stock levels remain accurate

Scenario: Successful Inventory Update
Given an order has been paid
And the order contains items "#cartItems"
When the inventory is updated
Then the inventory should be updated via "updateInventory" API call
And the cart should be cleared
And cart total should be reset to 0

name: Order Confirmation - Success
description: As a customer I want to receive order confirmation So that I have proof of my purchase
gherkin_text:
Feature: Order Confirmation
As a customer
I want to receive order confirmation
So that I have proof of my purchase

Scenario: Successful Order Confirmation
Given an order has been completed with ID "#currentOrderId"
And the customer email is "#customerEmail"
When the confirmation is sent
Then the confirmation should be sent via "sendConfirmation" API call
And I should see "Order confirmation sent successfully" message

name: Stock Level Check - Success
description: As a manager I want to check stock levels So that I can monitor inventory
gherkin_text:
Feature: Inventory Monitoring
As a manager
I want to check stock levels
So that I can monitor inventory

Scenario: Successful Stock Level Check
Given I am logged in as manager
When I check current stock levels
Then the stock levels should be fetched via "fetchStockLevels" API call
And the stock data should be saved to "#stockLevels"

name: Low Stock Alert - Items Found
description: As a manager I want to receive low stock alerts So that I can reorder inventory
gherkin_text:
Feature: Inventory Alerts
As a manager
I want to receive low stock alerts
So that I can reorder inventory

Scenario: Low Stock Alert with Items Found
Given stock levels have been checked
And there are items with quantity below 10
When the low stock check is performed
Then low stock items should be filtered via "prepareLowStockItems" action
And alerts should be sent via "sendAlert" API call
And I should see "Low stock alert sent" message

name: Refund Validation - Success
description: As a customer service rep I want to validate refund requests So that only valid refunds are processed
gherkin_text:
Feature: Refund Processing
As a customer service rep
I want to validate refund requests
So that only valid refunds are processed

Scenario: Successful Refund Validation
Given I am processing a refund request
And the order ID "#orderId" is provided
And the refund amount "#amount" is greater than 0
When I validate the refund
Then the refund should be validated via "validateRefund" action
And I should see "Refund request is valid" message

name: Refund Processing - Success
description: As a customer service rep I want to process refunds So that customers receive their money back
gherkin_text:
Feature: Refund Processing
As a customer service rep
I want to process refunds
So that customers receive their money back

Scenario: Successful Refund Processing
Given I have a validated refund request
And the refund amount is "#amount"
And the reason is "#reason"
And the order ID is "#orderId"
When I process the refund
Then the refund should be processed via "processRefund" API call
And I should see "Refund processed successfully" message

name: Sales Report Generation - Success
description: As a manager I want to generate sales reports So that I can analyze business performance
gherkin_text:
Feature: Sales Reporting
As a manager
I want to generate sales reports
So that I can analyze business performance

Scenario: Successful Sales Report Generation
Given I am logged in as manager
And I am on the reports page
When I set start date "#startDate"
And I set end date "#endDate"
And I generate the report
Then sales data should be fetched via "fetchSalesData" API call
And the report data should be saved to "#reportData"

name: Abandoned Cart Detection - Success
description: As a marketing manager I want to find abandoned carts So that I can re-engage customers
gherkin_text:
Feature: Abandoned Cart Management
As a marketing manager
I want to find abandoned carts
So that I can re-engage customers

Scenario: Successful Abandoned Cart Detection
Given I am logged in as marketing manager
When I search for abandoned carts from the last 24 hours
Then abandoned carts should be fetched via "fetchAbandonedCarts" API call
And the data should be saved to "#abandonedCarts"

name: Cart Reminder Email - Success
description: As a marketing manager I want to send cart reminder emails So that customers complete their purchases
gherkin_text:
Feature: Cart Reminder System
As a marketing manager
I want to send cart reminder emails
So that customers complete their purchases

Scenario: Successful Cart Reminder Email
Given abandoned carts have been found
And there are carts in "#abandonedCarts"
When cart reminder emails are sent
Then reminders should be sent via "sendReminder" API call
And I should see "Cart reminder emails sent" message
